```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Read in data

```{r}
energy <- read_csv("data/us_energy.csv")
```

Create a line chart of energy over time, with color based on the energy type

```{r}
energy_time_graph <- ggplot(data = energy, aes(x = year, y = quadrillion_btu, group = type)) + 
  geom_line()
```
